meanings.definition: Eyeglasses with lenses that have two different focal lengths
meanings.sent1: Grandpa's bifocal glasses helped him read books and see the TV without switching.
meanings.sent2: She bought bifocal glasses to read small print and look at the whiteboard in class.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about wearing bifocal glasses and accidentally seeing double.
meanings.sent4: His vision was like wearing bifocal glasses, seeing both the details and the big picture.
meanings.sent5: The detective wore bifocal glasses, spotting clues up close and far away with ease.
